title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 429.4 - Terms and conditions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 429.4 - Terms and conditions

State Regulations

The commissioner may impose such terms or conditions upon
the disposition of a work of art or historic object as the commissioner deems
appropriate to encourage its conservation and preservation for the public
benefit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
429.4

Adopted, New

York State Register, Volume XXXVI, Issue 22, effective
6/4/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
